title: ‘Ranil Go Home’ & ‘Ranil Stay Home’ simultaneously underway
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Protestors have gathered outside the former Prime Minister and UNP Parliamentarian Ranil Wickremesinghe’s residence in Colombo.
A group of protestors were seen opposing the Parliamentarian and demanding him to resign while another group of protestors were seen engaging in protests supporting the former Prime Minister.
Sri Lankans deserve to have their voices heard: New Zealand Ambassador
